title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Central
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Central 

Securities Depositories) (CSD Nominee) (Amendment) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall be deemed to have come into operation on the 

12th day of March 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited european union (central security depositories) (csd nominee) (amendment) regulation 2021 (2) regulation shall deemed come operation 12th day march 2021

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 2. (1) In these Regulations -
text_raw:
2. (1) In these Regulations - 

“Act of 2014” means the Companies Act 2014 (No. 38 of 2014); 

“central securities depository” means a central securities depository within the 
meaning of the CSD Regulation that is authorised to perform services in the 
State; 

“CSD Regulation” means Regulation (EU) No 909/2014 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 23 July 20141 on improving securities 
settlement in the European Union and on central securities depositories and 
amending Directives 98/26/EC and 2014/65/EU and Regulation (EU) No 
236/2012; 

“CSD nominee” means such body or bodies corporate as from time to time may 
be nominated by a central securities depository to hold securities represented in 
the depository’s securities settlement system. 

(2) A word or expression which is used in these Regulations and is also used 
in the CSD Regulation has, unless the context otherwise requires, the same 
meaning in these Regulations as it has in the CSD Regulation.
text_norm: 2 (1) regulation - act 2014 mean company act 2014 (no 38 2014) central security depository mean central security depository within meaning csd regulation authorised perform service state csd regulation mean regulation (eu) 909 2014 european parliament council 23 july 20141 improving security settlement european union central security depository amending directive 98 26 ec 2014 65 eu regulation (eu) 236 2012 csd nominee mean body body corporate time time may nominated central security depository hold security represented depository security settlement system (2) word expression used regulation also used csd regulation unless context otherwise requires meaning regulation csd regulation

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 3. For the purposes of Chapter 7A of Part 17 of the Act of 2014, “relevant
text_raw:
3. For the purposes of Chapter 7A of Part 17 of the Act of 2014, “relevant 

securities” shall include securities registered in the name of a CSD nominee.
text_norm: 3 purpose chapter 7a part 17 act 2014 relevant security shall include security registered name csd nominee

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 4. The European Union (Central Securities Depositories) (CSD Nominee)
text_raw:
4. The European Union (Central Securities Depositories) (CSD Nominee) 

Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 110 of 2021) are hereby revoked. 

1 OJ L 257, 28.8.2014, p. 1. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 19th March, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [119] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

16 March, 2021. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment.
